briefTitle: Feasibility and Impact of Group Interventions on Breast Cancer Patients Well-being
officialTitle: Feasibility and Impact of Yoga, Self-hypnosis and Cognitive-behavioral Group Interventions in Improving Well-being of Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Interest of patients in the three groups
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* first breast cancer without metastases
* between 18 and 75-year-old
* ability to read, write and speak French.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with a diagnosed psychiatric disorder or dementia
